Name: Prototype
Description: do stuff

Name: Teleport
Description: Телепортируйтесь через большие расстояния

Name: Seismic Buck
Description: Наносит урон {AoEMax} противиникам возле вас на {TargetEffects1Amount} физического урона. Последущие цели получают 45% урона.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your shockwave hits {AoEMax} enemies with an increased range of {AoERadius} yards
Your kick now deals {TargetEffects1Amount} Base Physical damage

Description: Timberwolf bite attack

Name: Hornet Sting
Description: Hornet sting attack

Name: Diamond Dog Slap
Description: Diamond Dog slap attack

Name: Poseys and Prickleys
Description: You can summon forth plants imbued with magical essence to pacify or incite your opponents

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your lullaby flower patch lingers longer, continuing to quell your enemies
Your lullaby flower patch exerts more potent magic, quieting your opponents more quickly

Name: Ground Pound
Description: Smash your forehooves down on your target.

Name: Cyclone
Description: You unleash a small but powerful cyclone damaging your enemies

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your cyclone requires less distance to gain full power
You can unleash several cyclones in rapid succession for several seconds, and suffer less fatigue

Name: Lantern Swoosh
Description: Lantern Monster attack

Name: Gale
Description: Create a slicing windy gust

Name: Magic Arrow
Description: You send a focused blast of magical energy damaging your target

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You expend more energy for a more powerful attack that leaves a lasting injury. Your opponent continues to take some damage for {TargetEffects0Duration} seconds after the initial hit
The duration of the lasting injury increases, while costing more of your energy
Your arrow travels further with equal strength
Your arrow travels even further with equal strength
Your arrow can now reach far distances and hits just as hard
Your arrow can now travel an incredible distance while maintaining its power

Name: Rough Terrain
Description: Create a field of rocks that harms and slows enemies

Name: Fire Breath
Description: roast the tasty ponies!

Name: Stare
Description: Stare damages and slows

Name: Admin Blast
Description: Shoots a blast of administrative power

Name: Pillow Barrage
Description: You pummel your opponents with pillows, but somehow it calms them down.  But I mean really, who can be mad in a pillowfight?

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You found a pillow! You can now deal more damage.
You found another pillow! You can now deal even more damage.
You hone your pillow-throwing skills, allowing you to hit harder.
You combine advanced pillow throwing techniques with yet another pillow in your arsenal to deal significantly more damage
Your pillow attacks slow your pillow enemies down
Your pillow attacks slow your pillow enemies down a little more
Your pillow attacks slow your pillow enemies down even more
Your pillow attacks slow your pillow enemies down by nearly half their speed
Your opponents become more and more dazed, preventing them from hitting back for {TargetEffects33Duration} seconds
Your opponents are stunned for {TargetEffects33Duration} seconds

Name: Dragon Rough Terrain
Description: Create a field of rocks that harms and slows enemies

Name: Adrenaline Surge
Description: Your attacks build a surge of adrenaline which you can unleash suddenly to deal {Damage} Physical damage and stuns everything in range

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You stun all of your opponents for {SplashEffects27Duration} seconds
Your attacks drive your opponent into their own frenzy. They deal more damage, but also take more. Angers by {SplashEffects0Amount}.
Your adrenaline flows faster. You now only need {ChargeAmount} stacks

Name: Jeering Shout
Description: Taunt your target for {TargetEffects29Duration} seconds and your next combat ability pulls in {TargetEffects30Amount}x more threat

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your next combat ability now pulls in {TargetEffects30Amount}x more threat
Taunt your target longer for {TargetEffects29Duration} seconds

Name: Airstep
Description: Releases a burst of speed with which increases your dodge by {TargetEffects0Amount}% for {TargetEffects0Duration} seconds, and leaves you invulnerable for {TargetEffects18Duration} seconds

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Increases your dodge to {TargetEffects0Amount}%
Increases your invulnerable duration to {TargetEffects18Duration}%

Name: Wind Rapier
Description: You unleash up to 20 stored wind power from your wings to create dangerous blades of wind. You can create up to 1 blade per attack, requiring 6 stacks each.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can create up to {TargetEffects1Amount} blades per attack, requiring {TargetEffects0Amount} stacks of wing power each.
Increase the reach of your Wind Rapier attack.
Your Wind Rapier attack affects a wider area.

Name: Guidance
Description: Your pet becomes stronger, faster, and smarter with proper training

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your pet becomes 10% tougher
Your pet becomes 20% tougher
Your pet becomes 30% tougher
Your pet becomes 40% tougher
Your pet becomes 50% tougher
Your pet learns how to ground pound
Your pet learns how to taunt
Your pet learns how to stun
Your pet learns how to cleave

Name: Friends Forever
Description: Your pet inspires you to be more resistant to damage. You gain +{TargetEffects0Amount} Armor.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your Earth Pony magic also allows your pet to heal {TargetEffects31Duration} HP/s
The bond between you and your pet helps you both last longer in a scrap. Now lasts {TargetEffects0Duration} seconds.
Your pet can help you avoid even more damage. You now gain +{TargetEffects0Amount} Armor and +{TargetEffects01Amount} Magic Resist
Your bond is so strong that you can surpass your own physical limits to protect your friend, increasing your maximum Health by {TargetEffects2Amount}.
Your maximum Health is now increased by {TargetEffects2Amount}.

Name: Home Field Advantage
Description: Creates a large area of entangling plants and other flowers that slows and causes {Damage} magical damage a second for {AoEDuration} seconds

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Increase the radius of your home field advantage
Your magical plants and flowers last longer, for {AoEDuration} seconds.
Your entangling magic flora becomes a greater hindrance to your enemies. They move even slower.

Name: Hypnosis
Description: You expend some of your magical energy to sway a creature to attack your other enemies on your behalf, but also weakening it in the process by 80%. Creatures more than 4 levels above your Magic level cannot be hypnotized, and strong creatures may entirely resist its effects.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can hold creatures in your power for a longer duration - up to {TargetEffects0Duration} seconds.
Your hypnotic gaze does less to reduce the creatureâ€™s normal strength, weakening it by only 70%.
Your hypnotic gaze does less to reduce the creatureâ€™s normal strength, weakening it by only 60%.
Your hypnotic gaze does less to reduce the creatureâ€™s normal strength, weakening it by only 50%.
Your hypnotic abilities require less of your own mental focus. You expend less energy

Name: Sphere of Protection
Description: You summon a sphere of protective energy around you, absorbing some of the brunt of magical attacks

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your protective sphere lasts longer
Your protective sphere becomes more potent. You take even less damage from magical attacks

Name: Transfusion
Description: Your aura of healing powers drains vitality from your foes, and strengthens your allies at their expense

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can syphon vitality from your enemies, and pass it on to more of your friends with greater efficiency
You can syphon vitality more potently, giving your friends back more vitality
You are able heal more allies and weaken more enemies at once

Name: Resuscitation
Description: You can revive your friends, allowing them to return with 20% Health, to fight longer or at least let them get away.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your increased training allows you to regain focus on the battlefield more quickly
Your friends are not as weak once revived, returning with 30% Health
Your friends are not as weak once revived, returning with 40% Health
Your friends are not as weak once revived, returning with 60% Health
Your friends are not as weak once revived, returning with 80% Health
Your friends are revived to their full vitality.

Name: Triage
Description: You are adept at recognizing injuries and responding promptly, restoring your friend's Health by 15% - 20% of your maximum Health. The more you focus on your patient, the more effective you become.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You need not be adjacent to your friend to patch them up
You can regain your focus more quickly after performing triage
You are able to heal your patient more effectively, restoring up to 17% - 22% Health based on your maximum Health.
You restore your patient's Health by 19% - 26% of your maximum Health.
You restore your patient's Health by 21% - 30% of your maximum Health.
You restore your patient's Health by 23% - 34% of your maximum Health.
You restore your patient's Health by 25% - 40% of your maximum Health.

Name: Regenerative Aura
Description: You activate a healing aura which reinvigorates you and your allies by 1.25% Health per second for 10 seconds.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: The potency of your aura increases, restoring 1.5% Health per second.
The potency of your aura increases, restoring 1.75% Health per second.
The potency of your aura increases, restoring 2% Health per second.
The potency of your aura increases, restoring 2.25% Health per second.
The potency of your aura increases, restoring 2.5% Health per second.
You can heal ponies within a greater radius

Name: Harmonic Rhythm
Description: Your music creates an inspiring aura, allowing you and nearby allies to fight longer and more efficiently. Gain +{SplashEffects0Amount} Energy and

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You and your allies can draw on a greater energy reserve, gaining +{SplashEffects0Amount} maximum Energy
You and your allies gain back expended energy more quickly, multiplying Energy regeneration by {SplashEffects0Amount}x
Your inspirational music emanates further from you.

Name: Reverberating Echo
Description: Your haunting tones confuses and pacifies your enemy, briefly preventing magical attacks. You can also cast it as an acoustical shield to echo damage back to your enemy from you or your friends.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can now reflect up to 6% of your enemy’s attack back to them.
You can now reflect up to 9% of your enemy’s attack back to them.
You can now reflect up to 12% of your enemy’s attack back to them.
You can now reflect up to 15% of your enemy’s attack back to them.
You can now reflect up to 21% of your enemy’s attack back to them.
Your enemy is prevented from using magical attacks for {TargetEffects0Duration} seconds.
Your music echoes, and reflects back enemy damage for a longer period of {TargetEffects34Duration} seconds.

Name: Melody
Description: The passion in your music inspires your allies to greater strength, increasing their Attack bonus by {TargetEffects0Amount} for {TargetEffects0Duration} seconds.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your music inspires your allies to strike with more vigor at your foes. They gain +{TargetEffects0Amount} Attack.
Your ally is reinvigorated by your music, gaining +{TargetEffects1Amount} Energy.
Your music inspires your ally from further away.

Name: Spectral Tunes
Description: Your haunting melody weakens your enemyâ€™s physical and magical attack

Name: Candy Shower
Description: You rain down candy upon your opponent, distracting and disorienting them

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your target becomes too hyper to stay angry. A sugar high makes them vulnerable to Sugar Crashes
You gave them too much candy!  They can barely see you enough to attack

Name: Sugar Crash
Description: Your Party Powers are able to drive ponies to Sugar Crashes with too much candy, pacifying them against giving you any trouble about it

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your enemies are too overcome by your party awesomeness to fight back
Too much Partying will always slow a pony down

Name: Change of Heart
Description: Get your opponents to loosen up. Calm down the angry ones, and energize the timid ones

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You are more skilled at getting everypony into the party. Happy, lively, and not being mean about it!

Name: Bubble Barrage
Description: Pony smash!

Name: Inquisitive Light
Description: Reveals the combat level of nearby targets for up to two minutes, but takes a toll on your energy. (Legacy ability)

Name: Admin Rough Terrain
Description: Create a field of rocks that harms and slows enemies

Name: Blowback
Description: You can send forth a targeted blast of wind to knock back or even slow down your enemies while moving. The faster you move the more area your attack covers, but the lack of focused energy slows your opponents less

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: The power of your blowback attack affects a larger area
Enemy movement is further impeded by the focused force of your wind blast

Name: Stored Strike
Description: Activate to reduce your opponent's attack, then release to strike back with his own power!

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Store up more of your opponentâ€™s attack
Your retaliatory strike hits harder

Name: PonyMob Ground Pound
Description: Pony smash!

Name: Ponymob Seismic Buck
Description: kick things

Name: GuardHeal01
Description: You are adept at recognizing injuries and responding promptly

Name: GuardCleave
Description: Hit the opponent nearest to you with an earth-shattering kick, sending out a shockwave which can disorient nearby opponents

Name: GuardWarStomp
Description: Hit the opponent nearest to you with an earth-shattering kick, sending out a shockwave which can disorient nearby opponents

Name: Surge Stacks
Description: Your attacks build a surge of adrenaline which you can unleash suddenly to damage and disorient your opponents

Name: Pet Ground Pound
Description: Pony smash!

Name: Pet Jeering Shout
Description: Taunt your target for {TargetEffects29Duration} seconds and your next combat ability pulls in {TargetEffects30Amount}x more threat

Name: Pet Sugar Crash
Description: Your Party Powers are able to drive ponies to Sugar Crashes with too much candy, pacifying them against giving you any trouble about it

Name: Pet Cleave
Description: Hit the opponent nearest to you with an earth-shattering kick, sending out a shockwave which can disorient nearby opponents

Name: Culinary Training
Description: By undergoing formal training, you are able to improve on your cooking abilities and mess up less often

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You further improve on your cooking abilities to make fewer errors

Name: Food Master
Description: You specialize in creating nutritious meals, giving you a chance to produce gourmet food

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You deepen your specialization, giving you a higher chance to create gourmet food

Name: Drinks Master
Description: You specialize in creating refreshing drinks, giving you a chance to produce gourmet drinks

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You deepen your specialization, giving you a higher chance to create gourmet drinks

Name: Sweets Master
Description: You specialize in creating extra-sweet treats, giving you a chance to produce gourmet sweets

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You deepen your specialization, giving you a higher chance to create gourmet sweets

Name: Larger Portions
Description: You learn to be efficient in your ingredient usage, granting you a chance at creating one more portion of your meal

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You become more economical in using your ingredients, increasing your chance of producing one more portion of your meal

Name: Recipe Salvage
Description: Carefully testing ingredients before using all of them gives you a chance at recovering the ingredients even if a cooking task fails.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You become more cautious of cooking disasters even as you gain more cooking experience, giving you a higher chance at reclaiming the ingredients should something go wrong.

Name: Mess Kit
Description: Your cooking prowess allows you to create the finest meals even with a portable mess kit.

Name: Metal Master
Description: While working with metals, you find more economical ways to craft the ingots, and produce less metal waste.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Continued specialization into metalwork enables greater efficiency of your ingot usage.

Name: Harmony Master
Description: You specialize in the craft of a jewelry artisan, allowing you to better siphon a gem's magical properties into armor more efficiently

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Further training continues to improve your ability to use fewer gems while achieving the same enhancements in armor.

Name: Perfectionist
Description: A more discerning eye allows you to correct tiny flaws in your metalwork, improving the chances of obtaining better quality equipment.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You begin to spot flaws even in the standard crafting process, tweaking them to enable more frequent production of quality equipment

Name: Production Line
Description: As you continue working, you become more industrious in your actions, lowering the time taken to produce equipment.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Long periods of repetitive actions soon become instinctive in nature, allowing you to work quicker based on muscle memory alone

Name: Portable Positivity
Description: You epitomize the spirit of an Artisan, enabling you to craft equipment anywhere.

Name: Metal Detector
Description: You find ores more reliably, with a 55% chance of correctly detecting an ore spot.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You are 65% sure where there are ores near you
You are 75% sure where there are ores near you
You are 85% sure where there are ores near you
You are 95% sure where there are ores near you

Name: Prospector Training
Description: You are able to search a larger area for ores

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can search up to 30 m for ores
You can search up to 35 m for ores
You can search up to 40 m for ores
You can search up to 45 m for ores

Name: Aint Got All Day
Description: Prospecting for ores becomes quicker.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Prospecting for ores is up to 2 seconds quicker
Prospecting for ores is up to 3 seconds quicker
Prospecting for ores is up to 4 seconds quicker
Prospecting for ores is up to 5 seconds quicker

Name: Critical Eye
Description: Increases the maximum number of ores you can get from a single ore vein, and the chance of finding a gem

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can find more ores per vein, with a slightly better chance of finding gems

Name: Green Hoof
Description: Reduces the time taken for your crops to grow by 5%

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your crops now grow 10% faster than usual
Your crops now grow 15% faster than usual
Your crops now grow 25% faster than usual
Your crops now grow 33% faster than usual

Name: Super Harvester
Description: Increases your crop harvesting speed

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You now harvest crops slightly quicker
You now harvest crops much quicker
You now harvest crops twice as fast

Name: Super Planter
Description: Increases the number of seeds than can be planted simultaneously to 10. Learning this is particularly tricky for ponies without farming talents.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You now plant 12 seeds per farming plot
You now plant 14 seeds per farming plot
You now plant 16 seeds per farming plot
You now plant 18 seeds per farming plot

Name: Floral Study
Description: You find a way to salvage flower seeds and gain partial knowledge about flowers which have wilted

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You gain a greater chance of retrieving seeds from wilted flowers

Name: Fuller Bloom
Description: Your improved planting technique allows flowers to bloom for an additional hour before wilting

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Flowers now stay in bloom for a total of 4 hours before wilting
Flowers now stay in bloom for a total of 6 hours before wilting
Flowers now stay in bloom for a total of 12 hours before wilting
Flowers now stay in bloom for a total of 24 hours before wilting

Name: Rare Bloom
Description: Increases the chance for your flowers to cross-pollinate to create a rare hybrid

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your flowers are more likely to cross-pollinate

Name: Igneous Grower
Description: Raises the growth rate of gems within geodes in your inventory

Name: Metamorphic Grower
Description: You gain a chance of growing an additional Elementium or Spatial crystal in addition to gems in your geode

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You have a higher chance of finding an Elementium or Spatial crystal in your geode
You will always find an additional Elementium or Spatial growing alongside gems in your geode

Name: Adept Crystallizer
Description: You can now hold up to 2 geodes in your inventory without growth penalties

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can now hold up to 3 geodes in your inventory without growth penalties
You can now hold up to 4 geodes in your inventory without growth penalties
You can now hold up to 5 geodes in your inventory without growth penalties
You can now hold up to 6 geodes in your inventory without growth penalties

Name: Foresight
Description: You gain a better idea of what you are researching

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can now choose which recipe you would like to research, as long as you know how to call upon it.

Name: Extrapolator
Description: Your analysis of the research trend allows you to better predict what items will be required next

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You can now complete the research in two steps. The items must still be provided in order, however.
You can now complete the research in a single step. The items must still be provided in order, however.

Name: Nondestructive Testing
Description: Careful handling of your research materials provides you a slightly better chance of preserving them during research.

Name: Potions Master
Description: You gain a small chance at brewing a concentrated potion, providing more intense effects to the drinker.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your experience with potion-making enables you to raise your odds of brewing a concentrated potion.

Name: Arcane Engineer
Description: You discover a quirk in the assembly runes that occasionally allows you to craft twice as many items with the same raw materials

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Futher experimentation allows you to exploit the assmebly runes' behaviour more often to yield double artifice

Name: Catalysis
Description: Experience allows you to work faster in your creative scientific endeavors.

Name: Headbutt
Description: The creature attacks something with its cranium

Name: Sunny Day
Description: This should be a healing effect, but for now, testing with damage

Description: Roc shoots a terrifying beam of light

Name: Light Aura
Description: Roc shoots a less terrifying beam of light

Description: Roc grab attack

Name: Serana'deth
Description: Poisonous purple bubbles

Name: Water Mastery
Description: You learn of how to channel the flow of water in weather. Drag this ability to your hotbar while wearing a weather pendant to unlock its full potential.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your familiarity with water allows you to expend less energy in channeling its power
Clever use of environmental vapor allows you to conserve your use of vapor flux
Stabilizing the flow of water allows you to take its range further

Name: Frost Mastery
Description: You learn the art of manipulating frozen water. Drag this ability to your hotbar while wearing a weather pendant to unlock its full potential.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: You become attuned to the cold, improving your ability to slow your targets further
You manipulate air currents to keep the warm air out, causing your targets to be slowed for a longer duration
You control the surrounding energy more effectively, reducing your use of Energy Flux
You have an even greater chance of not consuming Energy Flux

Name: Lightning Mastery
Description: You learn how to tame the wild nature of electricity. Drag this ability to your hotbar while wearing a weather pendant to unlock its full potential.

Upgrades.UpgradeDescription: Your control of lightning becomes steadier, lowering the damage to yourself
You take even less collateral damage when striking with lightning
You channel the power of the energy flux through yourself, lowering the energy you expend when conjuring lightning
You use even less energy to summon lightning
Energy flux enhances your body, boosting any physical attacks you deliver for the next few seconds
Your attacks are boosted further
